name: Fairwell
description:
"Unfair!", the sad clown sights, "It was always my biggest dream to become a clown, but now everyone is just laughing at me... Farewell!"

Controls: Rotate your phone to move up and down, avoid collisions and hold on to your balloons.

Music:

At The Fair - The Green Orbs

Johannes Brahms - Ungarischer Tanz Nr.5 g-moll
